name: Boston African-American National Historic Site
objective: As set forth in authorizing legislation, this program’s objective is to enter into cooperative agreements to mark, interpret, restore, provide technical assistance, or any combination thereof for such activities that may be necessary for the preservation of any properties within Boston African American National Historic Site.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Each year a cooperative agreement is entered into for the development of programing and management of the museum and surrounding properties.
Cooperative agreements have been utilized to provide for restoration of historic property and visitor services at Boston African American National Historic Site.
No projects were funded this fiscal year.
No projects were funded this year.
If funding is available cooperative agreements will be utilized to provide for restoration of historic property and visitor services at Boston African American National Historic Site.
No awards were made in Fiscal Year 2022

authorizations.text: Pub. L. 96, 430, Title I, Boston African American National Historic Site.

rules_regulations: 2 CFR, Part 200, 43 CFR, OMB Circulars, standard forms, and program information
